game.name: Dracula: Love Kills
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: The Queen of Vampires emerges from the ashes of history, seeking to destroy the world of humans and rule over its ruins! No one, human or vampire, will stand in her way!Count Dracula awakens, weakened and stripped of his powers after years of healing from his last battle with Dr. Van Helsing.
game.shortDescriptionEn: The Queen of Vampires emerges from the ashes of history, seeking to destroy the world of humans and rule over its ruins! No one, human or vampire, will stand in her way!Count Dracula awakens, weakened and stripped of his powers after years of healing from his last battle with Dr. Van Helsing.

reviewHighlights.text: 드라큘라 오리진의 정식 후속작 다만 정통 포앤클 어드벤처에서 HOG가 되어버렸다.. 장르만 바뀐 것이 아니라 주인공도 바뀌었는데, 전작은 반 헬싱이 주인공으로 드라큘라 백작을 물리치는 이야기였다면 이번작은 드라큘라 백작을 주인공으로 반 헬싱, 하인 이고르와 뱀파이어 여...
